← Releases

Missing.css Version 1.0.12

§ Changelog

  • We're switching entirely to npm for distributing missing.css. Prior versions will be kept on the.missing.style, but its use is deprecated and our release notes pages will not link to it. Instead, use one of many npm CDNs (unpkg, jsdelivr, etc.) or install the package via npm.
  • If a colored background is applied to an <aside> using the .bg class, it will have horizontal padding added to prevent the text hitting the edge of the background.
  • Colorways were fiddled with.
  • Fixed: Asides now have vertical margins equal to --gap.

Missing.css, by Deniz Akşimşek, funded by Big Sky Software and Commspace.

Also check out htmx and _hyperscript.

Made with 💙 in Ankara, Samsun, Rize and Cape Town.
